# Positive control
**Description**: CRISPR screens with _Coculture_ condition using a list of positive control genes. Negative LFC values indicate genes whose knockout can increase the efficacy of NK / T cell mediated tumor killing<br />

```{r, echo=FALSE, out.width='100%', fig.align='left', fig.cap=''}
knitr::include_graphics("assets/positive_control_final/QC_Heatmap_scaled_coculture.svg", error = FALSE)
```

-----

# 28783722 | NicholasPRestifo | Nature | 2017 | Mel624 | EffectT
## **Overview**
**PMID**: 28783722<br />
**Model**: Mel624 (human malignant melanoma cell line)<br />
**Treatment**: Effect T cell<br />
**Control**: Without T cell<br />
**Type**: Coculture-T<br />
**Description**: CRISPR screen in human malignant melanoma cell line Mel624 co-cultured with effect T cells. Negative LFC values indicate genes whose knockout can enhance the efficacy of T-cell mediated tumor killing

## **Original Figures**
```{r, echo=FALSE, out.width='75%', fig.align='left', fig.cap=''}

```

# 29301958 | KaiWWucherpfennig | Science | 2018 | B16F10 | OT-I.OVA
## **Overview**
**PMID**: 29301958<br />
**Model**: B16F10 (murine skin melanoma cell line) pretreated with IFNg<br />
**Treatment**: OT-I T cells specific for ovalbumin (OVA) peptide
**Control**: OT-I T cells unspecific for OVA peptide<br />
**Type**: Coculture-T<br />
**Description**: CRISPR screen in mouse skin cancer cells B16F10 co-cultured with OT-I T cells specific for OVA peptide compared to OT-I T cells unspecific for OVA peptide. Negative LFC values indicate genes whose knockout can enhance the efficacy of T-cell mediated tumor killing

# 32968282 | JasonMoffat | Nature | 2020 | 4T1-HA | CL4
## **Overview**
**PMID**: 32968282<br />
**Model**: 4T1-HA (engineered murine breast cancer cell line expressing haemagglutinin [HA] as marker antigens)<br />
**Treatment**: After CRISPR screen, 4T1-HA cells were cocultured with CL4 CD8+ T cells specific for HA antigen<br />
**Control**: CRISPR screen 4T1-HA cells without T cell treatment<br />
**Type**: Coculture-T<br />
**Description**: CRISPR screen in mouse breast cancer cells expressing HA antigen co-cultured with CL4 (HA-specific) T cells compared to untreated control. Negative LFC values indicate genes whose knockout can enhance the efficacy of CL4 (HA-specific) T-cell mediated tumor killing<br />
